title: Enhance agents and add skills from everything-claude-code
description: Absorb and optimize agent patterns and skills from everything-claude-code reference repo. Enhance existing 6 agents with richer checklists (security, code quality, confidence-based filtering, language-agnostic patterns). Add 2 new specialist agents (security-reviewer, build-resolver). Add installable skills system for reference knowledge. All content must be language-agnostic, supporting frontend, backend, Go, Python, TypeScript, Java, etc.
acceptance_criteria: Existing 6 agents enhanced with richer review checklists and patterns
Skills directory with 4+ reference skills installed by ainit
All agents and skills are language-agnostic

audit_log.detail: Enhance agents and add skills from everything-claude-code
Enhance agents and add skills from everything-claude-code reference

Enhanced 6 existing agents with richer checklists, added security-reviewer and build-resolver agents, added 4 skills (coding-patterns, testing-patterns, security-checklist, verification-loop). Updated installer and setup script.
